DORMOLEN. *t* An English Lady of middle nge, who has filled the situation of nursery GOVERXESS in Holland for two years , which she is now leaving on account of her services being no longer required, is desirous of obtaining a similar engagement in a respectable family ; would have no objection toundertake the charge of ehildren deprived of maternal care, or to assist a Lady in her domestic affairs, can be tvell recommended by seve*-al highly respectable persons in Bolland; has a knowledge of the french language etc. To apply for any further infor mation by post f ree letters, under theinitial M to Slr.
